mapper.insert: insert into COURSE_DATA ( COURSE_ID, COURSE_ORDER, CATEGORY, ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_NAME, ROAD_ADDRESS_NAME, PHONENUMBER, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_URL, X, Y, MEMO) values(#{id},#{cdto.order},#{cdto.category},#{cdto.address_id},#{cdto.address_name},#{cdto.road_address_name},#{cdto.phone_number},#{cdto.place_name},#{cdto.place_url},#{cdto.x},#{cdto.y},#{cdto.memo})
